HAB_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Authorization token used to perform privileged API operations against Builder, e.g., uploading packages or keys. No default value.

HAB_BINLINK_DIR.description: Allows you to change the target directory for the symlink created when you run `hab pkg binlink`. The default value is already included in the $PATH variable inside the studio. Default: /hab/bin.

HAB_CACHE_KEY_PATH.description: Cache directory for origin signing keys. Default: If running as root, /hab/cache/keys; otherwise $HOME/.hab/cache/keys.

HAB_BLDR_CHANNEL.description: The Habitat Builder channel you are subscribing to. Default: stable.

HAB_BLDR_URL.description: The endpoint for communicating with Builder. Used by the Habitat build system and the Supervisor. Default: https://bldr.habitat.sh.

HAB_DOCKER_OPTS.description: When running a studio on a platform that uses Docker (e.g., macOS), additional command line options to be passed to the docker command. No default value.

HAB_NOCOLORING.description: When set to the lowercase string 'true', unconditionally disables text coloring where possible. No default value.

HAB_NONINTERACTIVE.description: When set to the lowercase string 'true', unconditionally disables interactive progress bars (i.e., 'spinners') where possible. No default value.

HAB_ORG.description: The organization to use when running with service-group encryption. No default value.

HAB_ORIGIN.description: The origin name used when building packages. The signing key for this origin is passed to the build system. No default value.

HAB_ORIGIN_KEYS.description: A comma-separated list of origin keys to be shared with the build system. No default value.

HAB_RING.description: The ring used by the Supervisor when running with wire encryption. No default value.

HAB_RING_KEY.description: The name of the ring key to be used when running with wire encryption. No default value.

HAB_STUDIOS_HOME.description: The directory in which to create build studios. Default: /hab/studios when running as root; $HOME/.hab/studios otherwise.

HAB_STUDIO_BACKLINE_PKG.description: Overrides the default package identifier for the 'backline' package, which installs the Studio baseline package set. Default: core/hab-backline/{{studio_version}}.

HAB_STUDIO_ROOT.description: Root of the current studio under $HAB_STUDIOS_HOME. Infrequently overridden, no default value.

HAB_STUDIO_NOSTUDIORC.description: When set to a non-empty value, a .studiorc will not be sourced when entering an interactive Studio via hab studio enter. No default value.

HAB_STUDIO_SUP.description: Used to customize the arguments passed to an automatically launched Supervisor, or to disable the automatic launching by setting it to false, no, or 0. No default value.

HAB_UPDATE_STRATEGY_FREQUENCY_MS.description: Frequency, in milliseconds, to check for updates when running with an update strategy. Default: 60000.

HAB_USER.description: The user key to be used when running with service group encryption. No default value.

HAB_NON_ROOT.description: Enables the Supervisor to install packages as non-root user. Warning: It is highly recommended not to use this setting except under very specific circumstances due to associated security risks.

http_proxy.description: A URL for a local HTTP proxy server optionally supporting basic authentication. No default value.

https_proxy.description: A URL for a local HTTPS proxy server optionally supporting basic authentication. No default value.

no_proxy.description: A comma-separated list of domain exclusions for the http_proxy and https_proxy environment variables. No default value.

SSL_CERT_FILE.description: A variable to help you navigate firewalls. No default value.
